channel.title: Plagued Fate V1.0 Developement Log
channel.description:
[IMG]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/3688/paguedfate.png[/img] Goals -To create a stable PK friendly economy, along with an active PvM. -Friendly non-profitable environment/ experience. What makes Plagued Fate Unique? - Plagued Fate has many features that I believe to make it unique. Although my main focus upon this server is that no player is anymore wealthy than another. I plan on doing this without incorporating a spawn system of course, but instead making drop rates a little more than extremely common. I want there to be a fair amount of risk without a fair amount of risk. As for the Player vs. Monster, I have already gotten rid of some of the error ed bosses along with the ones that just don't make sense to have; I also added custom drops at a generous ratio along with new bosses at unique locations. This server even appeals to the skiller side of yourself in the fact that every skill is trainable with milestone capes, (Although some skills are being reformed.) [size=24pt]Completed Log (Dates Unavailable) [/size]
- Unique organized home. - New uncluttered shop system (I hate the PI shops so I completely re-did them.) - Useful Npc interaction added/ organized. - Npcs placed in the correct shop area according to actual Runescape. - Fixed the over 100 grammatical errors within the source... (Still in heavy process.) - Deleted useless immature commands/texts. - Organized quest tab into a useful command tab. - Brand new donator area with 3 unique bosses. - Brand new boss system, (Nearly all bosses replaced.) - New sprites added, (Client background, chat box reformed, etc..) - Item slot placement fixed (A few glitched items, no big deal.) - New items added to the donator chest and the awful "wheel of fortune". - Item stats modified, making the few customs a bit more useful. - Modified drops/ drop rates. - Area commands added, due to the lack of mobility or "City Teleports" - Working with the Fun-pk, (Lost item glitch.) - Reformed PKP shop so that the prices make more sense. - Straight uncluttered the "Commands.txt" file (It was brutally awful.) - Starter package updated to a PK friendly package. - Thieving area moved because I hated the old one. - Added a "PK Gear" shop because it is the initial intent of my server. (No Op'd items) - Prices about to be modified along with the items kept on death. - Website incorporated into server (Not hard but necessary.) - Donator ranks/ rights modified and added. - Donator teleport locations modified. (Notably the Revenant area added for donators along with a donator Nex area.) - Revenant drops added. (PvP armors and artifacts.) - Barrelchest moved to a more practical location. - Donator chill area moved. - Smithing area moved. - Removed all of the unusable objects around the home area. (Broken Stalls, Discolored Objects, Etc..) - Added Donator Lamp (To server and PFP Shop.) - Reformed the entire leveling system with 99 announcements and auto-skill capes - New dicing area incorporated - Reformed the entire PFP (Plagued Fate Points) Shop with sensible prices. - Added a Coin Exchange Shop so you can cash in coins for tickets. (100M, 1b, 2b) - Disabled Duel Arena until I can fix it properly. - Disabled Pest Control until I can fix it properly. - Disabled normal player yell for the time being. - Fixed the Cache Auto Downloading issue. (Thanks to Fridder) - Added a completely new Zombie Mini-Game from scratch. - Fixed/ Deleted/ Added some commands - Modified every single price to be more economically friendly (Ex: Abyssal Whip was 30m, it is now 3m) - Changed thieving stall amounts - Updated commands tab in-game - Added 508 map pack (Still needs some work due to patchy areas of invisible walls.) - Changed the Tormented Demon area - Added new items - Exp increase - Downgraded map packs due to too many glitches and it was just awful looking - Changed the training spot
There is much more that I am just forgetting at the moment, but I will add as I remember and go along. [size=24pt]Boss Drops (Added/Changed Frequently)[/size]
Torms- Claws, Dragon Kite, Dragon or, d bow/arrows Corp- Divine, spectral, arcane, elysian, spiritshield, blessed- KBD- deathcape, dominion Bandos- BGS, Bandos boots, Bandos Tassets, Bandos Chestplate, 750k lamp Armadyl- AGS, Arma chest, Arma legs, Arma helm, 750k lamp Sara- SGS Zammy- ZGS Dags- Berserker ring, Archer, Seers, Warrior, (i) Nex- Torva, Pernix, Virtus Avatar of Destruction- Primal plate, legs, kite, gloves, helm, boots, mual, and rapier Kalph Queen- Full Slayer, Ranger Hat, dragon full helm Kaplh Queen Flying- Korasi, Fighter Hat, dragon full helm BarrelChest- ardy cloak Jungle Demon- Polypore, blood necklace Kathfe- Extreme Ranging, Magic, Strength, Attack, Defence,(x3) Sea Troll Queen- Sagitarian Helm, Plate, Legs, Boots, Gloves Ice Queen- Celestial Helm, Top, Bottum, Gloves, Boots, Staff Revenants- Statius, Morrigans, Vesta, Zuriels
Media (Will hopefully be adding daily!) Temporary Client Background [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/6_clie10.jpg[/img] A few of the newly reformed shops. [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/shops10.png[/img] New Donator Area, comfortable, roomy, and it contains 3 awesome bosses. [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/donato10.png[/img] New Home Area, organized with correct shop locations. [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/home_m10.png[/img] Every single skill is trainable! (Ordered from left to right in photo, down the skill line in-game. First photo counts for attack, strength, and defense, minus hit points.) [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/all_sk12.png[/img] Full Farming (It is being redone due to some animation errors.) [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/7_full10.png[/img] "PK Gear" Shop (Nothing really OP'd, and you get the upgraded version of some items with PvM so I feel it is pretty balanced. This shop is changed frequently and is indicative of the kind of server I strive to emulate; that being a pk upon start up, yet economically friendly.) [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/8_pk_g10.png[/img] Hand Cannon (Came stock on source with very terrible animations/ timers. I have been working with some of the animations and timers but it is still pretty bad. Under heavy construction.) [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/9_full10.png[/img] New Zombie Mini Game! [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/110.png[/img] [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/210.png[/img] [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/310.png[/img] [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/410.png[/img] [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/510.png[/img] [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/610.png[/img] Zombie Drops. (Level 13: Zombie Gloves, Zombie Boots. Level 18: Zombie Mask, Zombie Shirt, Zombie Trousers. Level 24: Dark Dagger, Shadow Sword. Level 25: Lit Bug Lantern.) [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/710.png[/img] [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/810.png[/img] [img]http://i15.servimg.com/u/f15/16/16/97/89/910.png[/img] Truly Hideous Full Screen (It came stock on the source and I plan to remove or reform it shortly.) [img]http://i71.servimg.com/u/f71/16/16/97/89/410.jpg[/img] Added snow to the ground (Credits go to Runescape Sucks for his beautiful tutorial) [img]http://i77.servimg.com/u/f77/15/98/32/43/510.jpg[/img] [img]http://i77.servimg.com/u/f77/15/98/32/43/610.jpg[/img] [img]http://i77.servimg.com/u/f77/15/98/32/43/710.jpg[/img] Moved the rock crab training spot (I have always like this place better, and it is more roomy.) [img]http://i71.servimg.com/u/f71/16/16/97/89/110.jpg[/img] ~ Thanks for keeping up and looking at Plagued Fate! Nolan
